name: PHASESource
desc: An object that plays audio from a 3D location and orientation in a scene.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine)
items.desc: Creates a single point in the environment from which sound emanates.

items.name: init(engine: PHASEEngine, shapes: [PHASEShape])
items.desc: Creates a voluminous area in the environment from which sound emanates.

items.name: var gain: Double
items.desc: The amount of sound the source emanates.

items.name: var shapes: [PHASEShape]
items.desc: An array of shapes that collectively define the audio-emitting surface area of a volumetric source.
